title: PGA Tour Can Bar LIV Golfers From Playoff, Judge Rules
description: The narrow ruling came less than 48 hours before the start of the FedEx Cup playoffs in Memphis, but the broader turmoil could last for years.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder
media:description: Talor Gooch of the United States and two other players who've joined LIV Golf had asked to be allowed to compete in the FedEx Cup playoffs.
